mappers.update: update ${com.seeyon.apps.kdXdtzXc.po.TravelExpenseJiChu} set [机构编码]=?,[部门编码]=?,[机构编码OA]=?,[部门编码OA]=?,[更新日期]=SYSDATE where id=?
mappers.select: SELECT t.id as id, t.formmain_id as formmain_id, t.sort as sort, t.[序号] as xuHao, t.[出差人] as chuCaiRen, t.[英文姓名] as yinWenName, t.[出差人所在部门] as buMeng, t.[预计出发日期] as chuFaTime, t.[预计返回日期] as fanHuiTime FROM ${com.seeyon.apps.kdXdtzXc.po.TravelExpenseJiChu} t where t.formmain_id=? order by t.[序号] asc
